title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-2.1 - Approved entities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-2.1 - Approved entities

State Regulations

Home inspection courses and offerings may be given by any
college or university accredited by the Commissioner of Education of the State
of New York or by a regional accrediting agency accepted by said Commissioner
of Education; public and private schools; and home inspection related
professional societies and organizations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
§§
197-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
